faq.question: I have developed a new interatomic potential, and I would like to have it posted.  How do I do that?
faq.answer: Send the potential to potentials@nist.gov with format and citation information, and optionally any other notes you wish to include about what the potential was designed for, or important information about the implementation.  A prototype page will be created that will be posted publicly upon the approval of the submitter.
